member.name: M:SolvencyII.GUI.frmMain.CheckForupdateForManuallyDeployed
member.summary: The below method is used to check for the application updates, if the application is manually copied/deployed as a standalone copy. This method checks the Clickonce’s deployed link(URL) to get the current active latest version and its checked against the standalone copy’s application version(it's be stored in the XML file)

member.name: T:SolvencyII.GUI.MEF.SolvencyIIExtensions
member.summary: MEF implementation - currently not used for main template lookup. It was found to be slow with the large dll's containing templates. For the sake of speed reflections is now being used on the referenced dlls. Note that MEF will still superseed the reflection lookup so with a correctly configured dll in the correct place with the correctly named template, with the right version number - it will get used instead. (The correct path is the exe path \Extensions.)

member.name: M:SolvencyII.GUI.MEF.SolvencyIIExtensions.Compose
member.summary: Starting of MEF interrogation

member.name: M:SolvencyII.GUI.MEF.SolvencyIIExtensions.ComposeAsync
member.summary: Async Interrogation of MEF libraries. The composition is from the folder the exe is in with the sub directory .\Extensions.

member.name: M:SolvencyII.GUI.MEF.SolvencyIIExtensions.GetControlByTableVID(SolvencyII.Domain.Entities.TreeItem)
member.summary: Locates a UserControlBase (template) using first MEF and in it fails Reflections

member.name: M:SolvencyII.GUI.MEF.SolvencyIIExtensions.GetOpenSubControlByTableVID(SolvencyII.Domain.Entities.TreeItem)
member.summary: Locates a UserControlBase (template) using only Reflections

member.name: M:SolvencyII.GUI.MEF.SolvencyIIExtensions.GetOpenControlByTableVID(SolvencyII.Domain.Entities.TreeItem)
member.summary: Locates a OpenUserControlBase2 (open template) using first MEF and in it fails Reflections

member.summary: Gather the required template from the associated extensibility libraries

member.summary: The MEF can take sometime to setup a waiting state is required
